oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Reunion photograph of Carter County Civil War Union Veterans
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This large, framed photograph shows Civil War veterans at a reunion in Carter County, Tennessee. It is possible that these are veterans of the 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. They appear to be standing beside a church. The date Sept. 29-30 is written on it but not the year. They believe the church is Stoney Creek Baptist Church.
